titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to retain 80-percent deductibility for meal expenses of drivers of motor vehicles who are subject to Federal restrictions on hours of duty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to retain the 80-percent deduction for certain meal expenses of drivers subject to the hours of service limitations of the Department of Transportation.
